patthana8.50:4.1: Nasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.50:4.2: Nasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.50:4.3: Nasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkilesiko ca naasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.50:5.1: Naasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana8.50:6.1: Nasaṃkilesikañca naasaṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.50:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
